description: A spectacular synchronized water, light, and music show featuring choreographed fountain jets that dance to classical and modern music from 9 PM to 2 AM daily. Located at three main sites - Old Boulevard, Ardagani Lake, and Europe Square - with the Ardagani Lake location featuring an impressive three-dimensional laser show. Completely free to attend, these nightly performances have become one of Batumi's most beloved attractions.

vibe: Magical, enchanting, and communal. The Dancing Fountains create a shared experience where crowds gather in anticipation, then collectively marvel at the synchronized spectacle. The atmosphere is relaxed yet festive - families with children sit on blankets, couples stand hand-in-hand, and solo travelers lose themselves in the music and light. Each new musical selection brings fresh appreciation, and the free access creates an inclusive, democratic entertainment experience.
